Originally found in the [http://code.google.com/p/gwittir/ gwittir] project. As of Nov 12th 2008 [http://code.google.com/u/kebernet/ kebernet], the owner of gwittir, has been silent for 5 months.  Goda-Time needed its own project anyway.  I ripped Goda-Time out of the gwittir source tree and made it compile on its own.
